subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Football
Dogfighting
Cruelty to Animals
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: Michael Vick’s selection for an Ed Block award drew scorn from the People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals, but the team’s vote spoke to solidarity.
snippet: Michael Vick’s selection for an Ed Block award drew scorn from the People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals, but the team’s vote spoke to solidarity.
